title: Choice Fonts by Luc Devroye mentions Typophile discussions
content:
Are any of you aware of this page?

[http://jeff.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/choice.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106043811/http:/jeff.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/choice.html "http://jeff.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/choice.html")

If so, I apologize for the unnecessary post.

It's a useful page, and it's what rekindled my interest in fonts and typography. It also mentions some typophile discussions.
author: Palatine
